snippet.title: MySQL Basics & How to Get Started - SQL Select, Insert, Update, Delete
snippet.description:
Let's shift focus a little from Mobile Development and dive into the world of SQL and databases.  In order for you to understand the basics, we'll go over how to install MySQL and use SequelPro to login. At the end of today's video you'll understand how to write your own SQL queries to execute operations on your database. Enjoy.
